goal.en: "(1) understand importance of the atmospheric thermodynamic processes (2) understand the fundamental thermodynamic laws (3) understand the characteristics of dry and wet air (4) be able to read the skew-T diagram (5) understand the atmospheric stability"
goal.ch: "(1)具備大氣熱力過程的基本知識。 (2)瞭解熱力學三大定律。 (3)瞭解乾空氣與溼空氣的大氣特性。 (4)能夠解讀斜溫圖。 (5)判別大氣穩定度"

content.en:
"1. Introductory concepts
2. Gases
3. The First Law of Thermodynamics
4. The Second Law of Thermodynamics
5. Air and water
6. Profiles of the atmosphere
7. Thermodynamic charts
8. The thermodynamic equation"
content.ch:
"1. 大氣熱力學前言介紹
2.大氣中的氣體特性
3.熱力學第一定律
4.熱力學第二定律
5.乾空氣汗溼空氣
6.大氣垂直剖面
7.熱力圖
8.熱力方程式"

textbook.ch: Atmospheric Thermodynamics Elementary Physics and Chemistry
